name: Drag and Drop Playground - Game for kids
name_original: Drag and Drop Playground - Game for kids
description:
Drag and Drop Playground is a game for kids under 5, this is a educational game for toddlers, they have to drag the object and drop it on the matching shape, It's an excellent game to develop toddler's creativity by playing with shapes and figures, at the same time they will learn new words.

Drag and Drop Playground Game for kids is an educational game for kids and toddlers, it's intended to help toddlers to develop association skills and learn a few new words in the process 

Drag and Drop Playground Game for kids includes:
4 Categories with 3 different levels of difficulty
When they interact with an object, they will hear the name of the object.
Scoreboard so parents can check progress.

***This game can be played with mouse and touchscreen***
